111.content: Why is her Mom tickling her?
111.title: Her Mom

choices: For giving codes to an evil
1111.title: As a punishment

11112.content:
One week after KC came home from a mission her mom heard about that an evil got some secret codes. She knew that KC has been about to stop him but now he's come free. He broke into a secret laboratory and stole some dangerous weapons. She knew she had to punish her for giving codes to him. At the evening when KC was watching TV she knocked her out and tied her up in a small Room in basement. KC was tied to a table with her feet tied in stocks.

What is she wearing?
11112.title: For giving codes to an evil

112.content: Why is her Dad tickling her?
112.title: Her Dad

choices: as punishment for standing her up
Because she knows how much KC hates being tickled
14.content: Alright, why is Marissa tickling her?
14.title: Marissa (KC best friend)

143.content: What is her most ticklish spot?
143.title: Because she knows how much KC hates being tickled

15.content: Alright, who else would tickle KC?
15.title: other

1511.content:
Tickler was working on a new invention for tickling all people. KC was at home as she got a call. A new evil agent is in town and she has to stop him. She changed into her undercover outfit and sneaked to him. But there were many traps around his cave. Suddenly she tapped into a trap and ko-gas came out everywhere and kc was knocked out. Moments later robots came up and brought kc in a big hall. KC was wearing her black boots but white ankle socks. The robots removed her boots and tied her to a table in an I-Positon. But it wasn't a normal table. On the end of the table there was a pair of stocks where KC's feet were locked. It was a new invention: the tickle table!
A few hours later KC awoke slowly. She wasn't blindfolded but she couldn't move. Tickler came up to kc. "What is this? Who did this to me?", kc asked angry wondering why her boots have been removed. "Well if this isn't kc. How are you?", asked the tickler. "What do you want?" "I'm the tickler. I'm going to tickle all people in the world and you can't stop me." "The tickler? Tickling isn't very evil. Hehe." "And to keep you away from my evil plans you'll get a little torture." "what torture? A tickle torture? I'm not very ticklish.", kc said being defiant. " we will see soon. Hehe.", tickler said as he activated the tickle table. Kc was in panic because she was extremely ticklish all over her body but her feet were by far her worst spot. The next moment two robot arms came down and began tickling her
1511.title: The tickler

15112.content: Two robotic hands appeared and moved slowly to her armpits which are exposed became her hands are tied over her head. Suddenly the robots began their assault on the armpits as kc let out a shriek. She hands were scribbling all over her armpits while kc kept laughing all the way. After a while the tickler stopped the robots and began cutting holes in the outfit at her armpits so her bare armpits are completely exposed. The robot show no mercy and n instantly their attack on her bare armpits. This makes kc laugh even more and squirm more than before. After ten minutes the robots stopped and moved
15112.title: Armpits

15113.content:
Robotic hands appeared from the sides of the table and slowly lifted up KC shirt. KC tried to protest but was so cut short as the hands started to scribble of her belly and ribs. "Hey lehahahahhaha nooooo hahahahaha", KC screamed as she bucked an wiggled on the table. The hands show no mercy as they kept up their assult.
"Plhehehhehahahahhaa!!"
The fingers kept up for 7 minutes start and then stopped to give KC a break. She lay there panting trying to catch her breath. "Why are you doing this to me??", she asked??
"You have stuck you nose in my business one to many times KC! I know how ticklish you are and i'' going to use that to break you!!"
15113.title: Belly

choices: a table with medical restraints for the wrists and ankles
a chair with restraints for the wrists and ankles (not stocks)
1522.content:
Its was a cool sunny Sunday at the Cooper residence. KC was upstairs laying on her bed reading a magazine. Since it was a Sunday there was nothing to do and she had no active mission. Suddenly she got an email from the Agency. KC got up and went to her computer on her desk. She opened up the email and it read:

"KC, we are summoning you for special trading at head quarters ASAP. Now due to the nature of this training, you will need to wear a certain outfit. The outfit is as follows: tank top, shorts, standard footwear. That is all. "

'Hmmm, that's a rather odd email. Training? Certain outfit? Never seen this before, but it's an order so i guess i'd better go.' KC hopped into the shower and then got dressed in. a white tank top, black basketball shorts, black ankle socks and a pair of back and white Nikes running shoes. When she arrives at headquarters she is greeted by a man in a lab coat.
"Ahh KC, there you are. Good of you to come on such short notice, but this training is very important."
"It's no problem", replies KC, "But what is this training for?"
"You will see soon enough KC."
With that he takes KC to the elevator and they proceed to go down for what seemed like 15 stories. The doors opened and he lead her to a room. When he opened the door KC saw...
1522.title: Training

15221.content: When the door opened kc saw a table with medical restraints for wrists and ankles. "Why do I need to be tied up?" She says getting nervous. "Ita necessary for the training so lay down!" The man says. KC laid down on the table and the man tied her down. Then he removed her shoes leaving her feet socked. With that he left the room. After a few minutes two girls came in with a table full of tools. The girls went to
15221.title: a table with medical restraints for the wrists ...

choices: a room where KC runs on a treadmill
a room where KC runs a gauntlet
152211.content:
The girls walk into the room. One of them is pushing a small cart with what looks like a hairbrush, an electric toothbrush, some lotion and some plastic wrap. KC was very confused as to why these items were on the cart. What did they have to do with training. One of the girls turns to the other and says "I've got this training." The other girl nods and leaves the room. The girl remaining looks to be mid to late 20s, long blonde hair. She's about 5'9". She's wearing solid dark blue scrubs with light blue ankle socks and black Nike running shoes. She approaches KC.

"Hello KC. I'm Megan. I'll be your contact for the training. I know this must seem weird to you to come in for this 'special training' and immediately get tied to a table."
"I'll admit it is a little scary, but if it helps me in the field later then i'll get through it. So what is this training anyway?", KC asks.
"Well we'll be doing it in stages. First we'll need to prepare you, then you'll do stage 1 of the training, then we'll move onto stage 2."
"Alright, let's get to it!"
"Very well", Megan says as she removes KC left sock.
"Hey what are you doing?? Do my socks have to come off for the training??", KC says getting a little tense as her feet are very sensitive.
"Relax KC", Megan says trying to reassure her, "I just need to remove them for a few mins then I will put them back on. With that, Megan take the bottle of lotion and squirts some of it into her hand. Next she spreads it a little before applying it to KC bare foot, making sure to massage it in. When KC feels Megan touch her foot, she jumps and yelps having to bite her lips to keep from laughing. After Megan is done massaging the lotion in, she takes the plastic wrap and start slightly above KC's ankle she wraps the lotioned foot all the way down, stopping at the toes. She then puts KC's black ankle sock back on. Megan then does the same thing to KC's right foot. After putting back on her right sock, Megan undoes KC ankle and wrist restraints.
"Ok KC, the prep part is done, now go ahead and put on your shoes back on and let's go begin the first part of the training." KC puts on her sneakers and they leave and go to...
152211.title: Her feet

choices: Megan uses the electric toothbrush on KC's socked feet
Megan uses the hairbrush on KC's socked feet
1522111.content:
KC and her contact walk down a few hallways before arriving at a door. Megan opens it and she motions for KC to follow. KC follows her into the room. She sees a few treadmills along the wall as well as computers attached to each one. Megan walks over to one and says, "Ok let's start the first part of the training. All your going to do is run on this treadmill for about 90 minutes."
"That's all?", KC asks.
"Yup that's it".
"Alright, i'll get started", KC says as she walks over to the treadmill, climbs on it and starts to run. Megan adjusts the speed for KC so that she's at a constant jog, bit not a sprint. After 30 minutes, she checks in with KC to see how things are. KC replies she's fine and the training continues. At 60 minutes Megan checks in again. "Hey KC how are you doing and feeling? Everything ok?"
"Yea everything is good. The prep work you did to my feet is making them sweat though. It feels weird."
"You're almost done KC. Just power though it." Soon the time is up. KC gets off the treadmill and Megan hands her a towel and a water bottle. "Well done KC. Now let's go back to the room for the next phase of the training." They both walk back to the same room with the medical restraints table. "Alright KC, i'll need you to lay down on the table again." KC sighs a little, but gets on the table and lays down. Megan then straps KC's wrists and ankles down again. Now where will Megan start?
1522111.title: a room where KC runs on a treadmill

15221112.content: Kc was struggling against her restraints while Megan left the room. After a while she returned holding a hairbrush. "What are you doing? What's that for?" Kc asked nervous. " it's for your training " Megan says while removing her shoes.Megan began brushing the hairbrush against the socked soles of kc. Instantly kc began laughing and squirming. Megan smiled and brushed more. " Hahahahahahahahahahahahahaha" kc laughed all the time. After about 5 minutes Megan decided to
15221112.title: Megan uses the hairbrush on KC's socked feet

152211121.content: Slowly Megan removed K.C's socks. K.C wiggled her toes as a response to the cold air. Then K.C looks on in fear as Megan grabs the brush again. As Megan starts again K.C starts to laugh harder. Hearing this megan picks up her speed. She stops when she notices L.C starts turning red and breathing heavily.
152211121.title: Remove the socks

1522111211.content: Megan grabs the lotion and applies ot to K.C's feet. Then Megan starts to massage K.C's feet. This makes K.C less tense. Every now and then K.C lets out a few giggles, but is relaxed. Then Megan slowly grabs the brush and starts strokes up and down K.C's feet as fast as she can go. This makes K.C bust out with laughter. K.C starts to beg," Pleeease I'll do anyyyything just stop". Megan responds with" As soon I I find your braking point". After 5 minutes K.C is starting to cry. Then Megan stops and starts to...
1522111211.title: Add more lotion

15221112111.content: Megan grabs the toothbrushes and starts to turn it on. To that sound K.C can only imagine what Megan is planing to do with it. Just then small clamps come out from the ones that are on her anckles and grabs her toes spreading them. Then the toothbrushes makes contact down at her heal. Both making the same rotations from heels, to arches, and then they lay attack at the balls of the feet. Megan does this for 8 minuts. At that point K.C starts geting use to it. Then sticks one toothbrush in between her toes this makes K.C laugh louder then she did befor. Megan knew she found the sweet spot. Megan tickled between her toes for 15 minutes then K.C passes out. Megan the wrote on a clip bord that K.C fail the training and whould have to do it again. The end
15221112111.title: Grabs toothbrushes

info.brief_description: KC Cooper finds herself in ticklish situations
info.description:
Tickle KC Cooper from KC Undercover.

A Few Rules:
•No killing of characters
• no short chapters
•keep swearing to a minimum pls

Also this is a story devoted mostly to socked feet tickling. Barefoot is ok, but not to much please
